name: Pot Shots And Whiskey
description:
Controls:

[A]/[D] to move your cowboy

[Q]/[E] to balance your drunken lean

[SPACE] to shoot

[R] to begin reloading, [R] again to interact with the widget to finish reloading


Tutorial:

Howdy, careful there partner,

Seems like ye've got yerself some alcohol in yer system. You seem to be teeterin' a little.

That's alright, ya can probably still wield that nice 6 shooter of yer's.

Here, try out yer piece on ol' Bob here. Don't worry he don't mind. Nor will he shoot back at ya.

Ya can see where yer shot's gonna land by looking at that nifty little indicator there. Just tap the [Space] key and you'll let one loose.

Ya can also see where yer opponent intends to shoot. Just make sure ya get out of the way before he pulls the trigger. 

Make sure ya dont stun yerself by leaning too far to one side or another and fallin' down. Stabilize yerself with the [Q] and [E] keys. The more ya lean, the more yer shots veer off a straight path.

Start reloadin' with the [R] key, and press it again when the bullet is over that green area to reload successfully, ya can stun yerself if ya don't do it right. You'll see what I mean when you give it a try. But don't try reloadin when yer full or you'll stun yerself!

Also don't try shootin with an empty chamber, or, ya guessed it, you'll stun yerself.

Finally, don't let that whisky bottle get too low. That's yer life essence over there!

Anyways, go get them outlaws, or whatever it is ya do!
